name: Accordion
description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal a section of content.

name: Banner
description: A notification bar that can be used to display important messages to the user. It supports various properties such as color, size, and the ability to be dismissed.

name: Breadcrumbs
description: A navigational aid that allows users to keep track of their locations within the application. It displays the current location and also provides a means to navigate back to any levels above in the hierarchy.

examples.code:
import React from 'react';
import Breadcrumbs from './Breadcrumbs';
import { Icon } from '../Icon';
import { Link } from '../Link';

// Example of Breadcrumbs usage
const Example = () => {

  return (
    <>
      <Breadcrumbs>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' rightIcon={<Icon name='Home' />}/>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' current>Link</Link>
      </Breadcrumbs>

      <Breadcrumbs variant='shape' maxItems={3} itemsAfterCollapse={3} >
        <Link size='lg' href='#' rightIcon={<Icon name='Home' />}/>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' current>Link</Link>
      </Breadcrumbs>

      <Breadcrumbs variant='stroke' maxItems={3} itemsBeforeCollapse={2} itemsAfterCollapse={3}>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' rightIcon={<Icon name='Home' />}/>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' >Link</Link>
        <Link size='lg' href='#' current>Link</Link>
      </Breadcrumbs>
    </>
  );
};

name: Button
description: Displays a button or a component that looks like a button.

name: Card
description: Displays a card with header, content, and footer.

name: Checkbox
description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.

name: CheckboxLabel
description: A combination of a checkbox and a label. It allows users to make a binary choice for a given option and provides a label for better understanding of the option.

name: Combobox
description: A combination of a text input and a dropdown list. It allows users to select an option from a predefined list or enter a custom value.

name: FileInput
description: A control for selecting a file from the user's file system. It provides a user-friendly interface for file selection and supports various properties such as file type, size limit, and multiple file selection.

examples.code:
import React from 'react';
import ProgressBar from './ProgressBar';
import {Flex} from "@xtreamsrl/ui-kit";

// Example of ProgressBar usage
const Example = () => {

    return (
        <>
            <Flex direction='column' gap='md-4'>
                <ProgressBar progress={0} />
                <ProgressBar progress={25} />
                <ProgressBar progress={50} />
                <ProgressBar progress={75} />
                <ProgressBar progress={100} />
            </Flex>
            <Flex direction='column' gap='md-4' backgroundColor='grey'>
                <ProgressBar progress={0} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar progress={25} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar progress={50} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar progress={75} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar progress={100} inverted={true}/>
            </Flex>

            <Flex direction='column' gap='md-4'>
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={0} />
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={25} />
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={50} />
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={75} />
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={100} />
            </Flex>
            <Flex direction='column' gap='md-4' backgroundColor='grey'>
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={0} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={25} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={50} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={75} inverted={true}/>
                <ProgressBar type='separated' progress={100} inverted={true}/>
            </Flex>
        </>
    );
};

import React from 'react';
import Rate from './Rate';
import {Flex} from "@xtreamsrl/ui-kit";

// Example of RateAndFeedback usage
const Example = () => {

    return (
        <>
          <Flex gap='md-4'>
            <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-8'>
              <Rate type='star' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xs'} onChange={(e, value) => console.log(value)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'sm'} onChange={(e) => console.log(e)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'md'} onChange={(e, value) => console.log(value)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xl'} onChange={(e) => console.log(e)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xxl'} onChange={() => console.log("third")}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xxxl'} onChange={() => console.log("fourth")}></Rate>
            </Flex>
            <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-8'>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xs'} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'sm'} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'md'} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xl'} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xxl'} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'filled'} size={'xxxl'} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
            </Flex>
            <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-8'>
              <Rate type='star' size={'xs'} onChange={(e, value) => console.log(value)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' size={'sm'} onChange={(e) => console.log(e)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' size={'md'} onChange={(e, value) => console.log(value)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' size={'xl'} onChange={(e) => console.log(e)}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' size={'xxl'} onChange={() => console.log("third")}></Rate>
              <Rate type='star' size={'xxxl'} onChange={() => console.log("fourth")}></Rate>
            </Flex>
            <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-8'>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'outline'} size={'xs'} defaultValue={3.5} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'outline'} size={'sm'} defaultValue={3.5} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'outline'} size={'md'} defaultValue={3.5} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'outline'} size={'xl'} defaultValue={3.5} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'outline'} size={'xxl'} defaultValue={3.5} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
              <Rate type='heart' emptyStyle={'outline'} size={'xxxl'} defaultValue={3.5} onChange={() => {}}></Rate>
            </Flex>
          </Flex>
        </>
    );
};

name: Select
description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick fromtriggered by a button.

name: Slider
description: An input where the user selects a value from within a given range.

info.code:
import {SafeKeyOf} from '../utils'

interface SpinnerSize {
    12: true,
    14: true,
    16: true,
    20: true,
    24: true,
    28: true,
    32: true
}

export interface SpinnerProps {
    size?: SafeKeyOf<SpinnerSize>
    inverted?: boolean
    state?: 'determinate' | 'indeterminate'
    value?: number
}

examples.code:
import React from 'react';
import Spinner from './Spinner';
import {Flex} from "@xtreamsrl/ui-kit";

// Example of Spinner usage
const Example = () => {

    return (
        <>
            <Flex gap='md-5'>
                <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-6'>
                    <Spinner size={12}/>
                    <Spinner size={14}/>
                    <Spinner size={16}/>
                    <Spinner size={20}/>
                    <Spinner size={24}/>
                    <Spinner size={28}/>
                    <Spinner size={32}/>
                </Flex>
                <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-6'>
                    <Spinner size={12} state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={14} state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={16} state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={20} state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={24} state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={28} state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={32} state='determinate' value={25}/>
                </Flex>
                <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-6' backgroundColor='grey'>
                    <Spinner inverted size={12}/>
                    <Spinner inverted size={14}/>
                    <Spinner inverted size={16}/>
                    <Spinner inverted size={20}/>
                    <Spinner inverted size={24}/>
                    <Spinner inverted size={28}/>
                    <Spinner inverted size={32}/>
                </Flex>
                <Flex direction='column' gap='sm-6' backgroundColor='grey'>
                    <Spinner size={12} inverted state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={14} inverted state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={16} inverted state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={20} inverted state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={24} inverted state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={28} inverted state='determinate' value={25}/>
                    <Spinner size={32} inverted state='determinate' value={25}/>
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
        </>
    );
};

name: Switch
description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.

name: Tabs
description: A set of layered sections of contentknown as tab panelsthat are displayed one at a time.

name: Tooltip
description: A popup that displays information related to an element when the element receives keyboard focus or the mouse hovers over it.
